text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The candidate answer discusses consent, connection, and applicable law as jurisdictional tests for counterclaims but fails to mention or discuss the interpretive principle of systemic integration under Article 31(3)(c) of the Vienna Convention on the Law of Treaties (VCLT), which is the specific requirement of this criterion.", "criterion_id": "4e7e133a-ade5-436a-a620-885862e91de8"}
